dataset_id: IceBridge MCoRDS L2 Ice Thickness V001
title: IceBridge MCoRDS L2 Ice Thickness V001
summary: This data set contains depth sounder measurements of elevation, surface, bottom, and thickness for Greenland and Antarctica taken from the Multichannel Coherent Radar Depth Sounder (MCoRDS). The data were collected as part of Operation IceBridge funded aircraft survey campaigns.
